meanings.definition: Resembling a trumpet in shape or sound.
meanings.sent1: The flower had a trumpetlike shape, tapering at one end.
meanings.sent2: The trumpetlike call of the swan echoed across the lake.
meanings.sent3: The trumpetlike clouds in the sky seemed to announce a storm.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as trumpetlike as a fanfare at a royal event.
meanings.sent5: The trumpetlike blast of the train whistle signaled its departure.
